008DE739.Phase31Description: I found no signs of Neyrelle in the chapel. She was never here. Heading outside to break the news to Lorath, I see Iosef and a small group of Knights Penitent approaching.

0871A46B.Toast: Meet Neyrelle at the Forsaken Chapel

803B8057.Phase20Description: With the Knights Penitent dead at our feet, Lorath and I must make our plan to find Neyrelle and the soulstone.

9367FF5C.Phase34Description: Iosef appears to be searching for Neyrelle and the soulstone. Surely the Cathedral of Light thinks all of us heretics now. Lorath seems to be out of patience.

C9FCD1EA.Phase5Description: Lilith is defeated. Lorath and I make for the old desert chapel to meet up with Neyrelle, who escaped with the soulstone containing Mephisto's essence.
